title: TINY Intel PC Comes With RTX Muscle
description: *Today's video sponsor* Go sign up to Linode here:   I bought a tiny Intel PC just to take it apart an stare at it's insides.  The tear down video I used:   Get some AWESOME Dawid T-shirts, Mouse pads and more here:   Play some Minecraft on the Dawid Does Minecraft server courtesy of our friends at Linode! Dawid Does Minecraft Name: Mctenthiddy, server IP: mc.tenthiddy.com It works on Java version 1.19.3  Support the channel on Patreon:    *Follow me on whichever Social media you don't hate* Discord:  Twitch:  Twitch bits on YouTube:
